We have multiple Epic full-time permanent roles in the midwest. Please send your resumes to darrington@medianthealthcare.com

Mediant Health Resources, Inc. provides subject matter solutions (EPIC© - MEDITECH - Cerner© - McKesson - Eclipsys© - Allscripts – NextGen - AMISYS - FACETS© - Xcelys - QNXT - MetaVance) to a broad cross-section of Healthcare Providers and Payors nationwide.

The Nation's Premier Healthcare/Managed Care IT Solutions Provider for over 12 years. H/P TECHNOLOGIES, INC. provides both direct permanent staffing and consulting solutions to a broad cross-section of healthcare/managed care clients nationwide. Our services include system implementation, project management, optimization, custom reporting, configuration, go-live support, training and knowledge transfer in the EPIC©, Cerner©, Eclipsys©, MEDITECH, Allscripts&trade, McKesson, FACETS©, AMISYS, QNXT&trade, PowerMHS, PowerSTEPP solutions, as well as within the Ambulatory and Practice Management arena.Our goal is to excel in providing high-quality, cost-effective clinical and managed care resource solutions while maintaining unequalled customer loyalty and integrity.
A.S.A.P. stands for Action to Save and Preserve Properties. We would bid on real estate to fix up to living condition.
